news.content:
The ThreeFold Token is now available on 1inch.io!

1inch connects many third party DEXes and has its own liquidity pools as well, to provide the best possible pricing for end users. It is an easy entry to the DeFi space.

ðŸŽ’ Learn how to get TFT on the Binance Smart Chain using 1inch here.
news.excerpt: The ThreeFold Token is now available on DeFi entry point 1inch!

next.title: ThreeFold Grid 3 Mainnet Update
next.excerpt: TF Grid 3 Mainnet has been launched with limited capacity! Just close community news, for now.
